org.mini2Dx.core.reflect.jvm

Class JvmReflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.reflect.jvm.JvmReflection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reflection

    public class JvmReflection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reflection
    Implementation of Reflection where JVM-based reflection is supported
